programmes.show_description: Paul Hollins has the best music through the night until 4am. Send a message to Paul on your Alexa, just say... "Alexa, send a comment to Smooth Radio"
Gary King with the best songs to start the day on Smooth Radio. Send a message to Gary on your Alexa, just say... "Alexa, send a comment to Smooth Radio"
Start the day with Jenni Falconer as she kicks off Smooth's "More Music Morning". Wake up with Smooth on your Alexa, just say "Alexa, play Smooth"
Kate Garraway kicks off her show from 10am with an hour of non-stop music!  Send a message to Kate on your Alexa, just say... "Alexa, send a comment to Smooth"
Paul Phear has the best music all afternoon. Send a message to Paul on your Alexa, just say... "Alexa, send a comment to Smooth"
Angie Greaves has the best music on Smooth. Send a message to Angie on your Alexa, just say... "Alexa, send a comment to Smooth Radio"
Unwind with the most relaxing music, in the Smooth Sanctuary with Darren Parks. Send a message to Darren on your Alexa, just say... "Alexa, send a comment to Smooth Radio"
Martin Collins closes out the day with the most relaxing music. Send a message to Martin on your Alexa, just say... "Alexa, send a comment to Smooth Radio"
